short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LEVERAGE your friends birthday to get leads and sales with just a click!!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Birthday Wisher is a chrome extension for Facebook that helps you to send automated wishes to all your friends who has their birthdays. It also allows you to send automated personal messages to everyone on their birthdays. Let's make their special day more special by wishing them or making them a special OFFER!!! use Birthday Wisher today if you want to make your Facebook friends feel SPECIAL and REMEMBERED.
